item.description:
let's meetup for a skate along the charles river on memorial day, monday, 25 may at 1 pm.

we'll meet at the DCR Hatch Memorial Shell at 1:00 p.m. and chat a bit while waiting for stragglers. we'll start skating at about 1:15 pm and skate along the river for an hour or so and see how it goes for everyone.

after the skate, perhaps we can drag our sweaty selves over to the border cafe in harvard square for a bite to eat and a margarita. visit the border cafe locations page and click on 'Cambridge', then 'view our menu' or 'map & directions' for more information.

hope to see you on memorial day!

other details:

weather:

i'll be watching the weather and, if necessary, i'll cancel as early as possible the morning of the event.

directions / finding me:

see here for a DCR page with directions to the Hatch Shell.

i'll be either directly in front of the hatch shell or over by the snack bar/refreshment stand and i look pretty much like my picture, although i'll probably be wearing a baseball cap. if i'm just lounging around without a hat, look for a big shaved head. <-8

as noted above, i'll also email my cell # to anyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 11 a.m.

who should attend:

everybody! this is a skating event for all skill levels, so come on out and meet other skaters. (in general my skating events will be for all comers.) i'll hang with 'the pack' (if there is one), but you're all welcome to come and go as you please.
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 25 may, 11 a.m.
item.name: memorial day skate
